data.revised_prompt: Generate a high-quality, professional image of a 'Spicy Ginger Snap' cocktail. The cocktail is served in an elegant short rocks glass with a thick base for stability. The drink flaunts a warm amber hue with golden undertones borne out of the bourbon it contains. A fresh, thin slice of ginger floats elegantly on the surface. A curled peel of lemon garnishes the rim of the glass which delightfully catches soft, ambient light, creating gentle reflections at the base. The setting is a textured, dark wooden background with subtle shadows cast, adding to the overall sophistication and warmth of the scene. The image should exude an intimate and cozy vibe perfect for an elegant setting. Let the overall feel be realistic and appealing, as if photographed by a professional without any text or watermarks, and a carefully blurred background to emphasize focus on the cocktail.
